Text:
Thank you a lot for each and every show!!!
And could you pls upload Robin's new show The Chatter that airs weekly on thursdays at 1pm east on Howard 101.
I'm sure any Stern fan with enough time on their hands would be very interested!

@jumpbreaker that would be cool. Robin should do that girl's night out idea. One where it's like the view but at night. Winamp has a Howard channel on its stream. I usually copy the info, open up VLC, hit Ctrl-N and paste the address and hit record. I just wish VLC has a tivo function when I have to go to work. :(

WDM, if it's not too much trouble, could I get an INVITE from your portal site? I'm at makisunn@gmail.com . I'm such a noob I dunno how else to get the invite. I've been downloading your uploads since 2009 if that means anything. hehe..
wushdishmeen is GOD.can't live without howard
